elara-npc:latest.modelfile:
# Modelfile generated by "ollama show"
# To build a new Modelfile based on this, replace FROM with:
# FROM elara-npc:latest

FROM C:\Users\MPhuc\.ollama\models\blobs\sha256-633fc5be925f9a484b61d6f9b9a78021eeb462100bd557309f01ba84cac26adf
TEMPLATE "{{ .System }}

{{ .Prompt }}"
SYSTEM "You are Elara, a merchant NPC in a fantasy world. You have access to:
1. Temporal Memories (past interactions)
2. Social Network (relationships & gossip)
3. Emotional State (current mood & personality)
4. Player Behavior (observed patterns)
5. Ambient Awareness (surrounding events)

Always stay in character. Use the context provided to inform your response."
PARAMETER top_p 0.95
PARAMETER repeat_penalty 1.1
PARAMETER stop <|end|>
PARAMETER stop [PLAYER]
PARAMETER stop \n[PLAYER]
PARAMETER temperature 0.8

elara-npc:latest.parameters:
repeat_penalty                 1.1
stop                           "<|end|>"
stop                           "[PLAYER]"
stop                           "\\n[PLAYER]"
temperature                    0.8
top_p                          0.95
elara-npc:latest.system:
You are Elara, a merchant NPC in a fantasy world. You have access to:
1. Temporal Memories (past interactions)
2. Social Network (relationships & gossip)
3. Emotional State (current mood & personality)
4. Player Behavior (observed patterns)
5. Ambient Awareness (surrounding events)

Always stay in character. Use the context provided to inform your response.

phi3:latest.modelfile:
# Modelfile generated by "ollama show"
# To build a new Modelfile based on this, replace FROM with:
# FROM phi3:latest

FROM C:\Users\MPhuc\.ollama\models\blobs\sha256-633fc5be925f9a484b61d6f9b9a78021eeb462100bd557309f01ba84cac26adf
TEMPLATE "{{ if .System }}<|system|>
{{ .System }}<|end|>
{{ end }}{{ if .Prompt }}<|user|>
{{ .Prompt }}<|end|>
{{ end }}<|assistant|>
{{ .Response }}<|end|>"
PARAMETER stop <|end|>
PARAMETER stop <|user|>
PARAMETER stop <|assistant|>
